TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookie extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供创建和操作各 HTTP Cookie 的类型安全方法。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to create and manipulate individual HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类获取和设置各个 cookie 的属性。The class gets and sets properties of individual cookies. 类提供了用于存储、检索和管理多个 cookie 的方法。The class provides methods to store, retrieve, and manage multiple cookies. ASP.NET 包括两个内部 cookie 集合。ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. 通过 对象的 集合访问的集合包含客户端发送到 `Cookie` 标头中的服务器的 cookie。The collection accessed through the collection of the object contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. 通过 对象的 集合访问的集合包含在服务器上创建的新 cookie，并传输到 `Set-Cookie` HTTP 响应标头中的客户端。The collection accessed through the collection of the object contains new cookies created on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` HTTP response header. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检查 对象中名为 `DateCookieExample` 的 cookie。The following code example demonstrates how to check for a cookie named `DateCookieExample` in the object. 如果未找到该 cookie，则将创建它并将其添加到 对象。If the cookie is not found, it is created and added to the object. Cookie 设置为10分钟后过期。The cookie is set to expire in 10 minutes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookie/cs/HttpCookie.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookie/vb/HttpCookie.vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 `Domain` 特性会限制将 cookie 传输到从该域请求资源的客户端。Setting the `Domain` attribute limits transmission of the cookie to clients requesting a resource from that domain. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 cookie 的域。The following code example sets the cookie's domain. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查 cookie 集合中的每个成员的多个值。The following code example examines each member of a cookie collection for multiple values. 如果 cookie 的 属性是 `true`的，指示存在多个值，则此示例将值名称复制到一个字符串数组中，并将相应的值复制到另一个字符串数组中。If a cookie's property is `true`, indicating that multiple values are present, this example copies the value names into one string array and the corresponding values into another string array. 有关如何为 cookie 创建多个值的示例，请参阅 。For an example of how to create multiple values for a cookie, see . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.HasKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HttpOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.HttpOnly : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否可通过客户端脚本访问 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a cookie is accessible by client-side script.

value.span: 如果 Cookie 具有 特性且不能通过客户端脚本访问，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the cookie has the attribute and cannot be accessed through a client-side script; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Microsoft Internet Explorer 版本 6 Service Pack 1 和更高版本支持 cookie 属性 ，可帮助减少导致盗用 cookie 的跨站点脚本威胁。Microsoft Internet Explorer version 6 Service Pack 1 and later supports a cookie property, , that can help mitigate cross-site scripting threats that result in stolen cookies. 被盗的 cookie 可以包含将用户标识到站点的敏感信息，例如 ASP.NET 会话 ID 或 forms 身份验证票证，攻击者可能会重播这些信息来伪装为用户或获取敏感信息。Stolen cookies can contain sensitive information identifying the user to the site, such as the ASP.NET session ID or forms authentication ticket, and can be replayed by the attacker in order to masquerade as the user or obtain sensitive information. 当兼容的浏览器收到 `HttpOnly` cookie 时，客户端脚本将无法访问该 cookie。When an `HttpOnly` cookie is received by a compliant browser, it is inaccessible to client-side script. > [!CAUTION] > 将 属性设置为 "`true` 不会阻止访问网络通道的攻击者直接访问 cookie。Setting the property to `true` does not prevent an attacker with access to the network channel from accessing the cookie directly. 请考虑使用安全套接字层（SSL）来帮助防范这种情况。Consider using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to help protect against this. 工作站安全也很重要，因为恶意用户可以使用打开的浏览器窗口或包含持久 cookie 的计算机，以获取对具有合法用户身份的网站的访问权限。Workstation security is also important, as a malicious user could use an open browser window or a computer containing persistent cookies to obtain access to a Web site with a legitimate user's identity. 有关可能的攻击以及此属性如何帮助缓解这些攻击的详细信息，请参阅[用仅限 HTTP 的 Cookie 缓解跨站点脚本](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=41580)。For more information on possible attacks and how this property can help mitigate them, see [Mitigating Cross-site Scripting With HTTP-only Cookies](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=41580). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何编写 `HttpOnly` cookie，并演示客户端如何通过 ECMAScript 来访问它。The following code example demonstrates how to write an `HttpOnly` cookie and shows how it is not accessible by the client through ECMAScript. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpOnlyCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpOnlyCookie/CS/httponlycookiecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpOnlyCookie#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HttpOnlyCookie/vb/httponlycookievb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要使用当前 Cookie 传输的虚拟路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the virtual path to transmit with the current cookie.

value.span: 要使用 Cookie 传输的虚拟路径。

span.span: The virtual path to transmit with the cookie.

value.span: 默认为 ，也就是服务器根目录。

span.span: The default is , which is the server root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性扩展了 属性，以完全描述 cookie 应用到的特定 URL。The property extends the property to completely describe the specific URL to which the cookie applies. 例如，在 URL `http:/www.microsoft.com/asp`中，域为 `www.microsoft.com`，路径为/asp。For example, in the URL `http:/www.microsoft.com/asp`, the domain is `www.microsoft.com` and the path is /asp. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置新 cookie 的 属性。The following code example sets the property of a new cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Path Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Path Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Path Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Path Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::SameSiteMode SameSite { System::Web::SameSiteMode get(); void set(System::Web::SameSiteMode value); };
member this.SameSite : System.Web.SameSiteMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 cookie 的 SameSite 属性的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value for the SameSite attribute of the cookie.

value.span: 枚举值之一，表示 cookie 的强制模式或 `(SameSiteMode)(-1)` （由配置文件中的字符串 `Unspecified` 表示）。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that represents the enforcement mode of the cookie or `(SameSiteMode)(-1)` (represented by the string `Unspecified` in config files).

value.span: 默认值取决于更新。

span.span: The default value depends on updates.

value.span: 有关默认值和最新更新的详细信息，请参阅 "备注"。

span.span: For more information on defaults and recent updates, see Remarks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值由[知识库文章 4531182](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4531182/kb4531182)和[知识库文章 4524421](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4524421/kb4524421)中所述的更新修改。The default value of this property was modifed by updates described in [KB article 4531182](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4531182/kb4531182) and [KB article 4524421](https://support.microsoft.com/help/4524421/kb4524421). 如果没有这些更新，则默认值为 ，这不会发出 `SameSite` 的 cookie 标头。Without these updates, the default value is , which does not emit the `SameSite` cookie header. 这符合[https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies-07#section-4.1](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies-07#section-4.1)。This conforms to [https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies-07#section-4.1](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-first-party-cookies-07#section-4.1). 应用这些更新后，默认值为 `(SameSiteMode)(-1)`，这对应于 `Unspecified`。After these updates have been applied, the default value is `(SameSiteMode)(-1)`, which corresponds to `Unspecified`. 这会保留以前的行为。This preserves the earlier behavior. 设置 `SameSiteMode.None` 会导致发出 "SameSite = None"。Setting `SameSiteMode.None` causes "SameSite=None" to be emitted. 这一新行为符合[https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-cookie-incrementalism-00](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-cookie-incrementalism-00)。This new behavior conforms to [https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-cookie-incrementalism-00](https://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-west-cookie-incrementalism-00).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Secure { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Secure : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否使用安全套接字层 (SSL)（即仅通过 HTTPS）传输 Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to transmit the cookie using Secure Sockets Layer (SSL)--that is, over HTTPS only.

value.span: 如果通过 SSL 连接 (HTTPS) 传输 Cookie，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to transmit the cookie over an SSL connection (HTTPS); otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用 SSL 为整个应用程序设置 cookie 传输，请在应用程序的配置文件（位于应用程序的根目录下）中启用它。To set the transmission of cookies using SSL for an entire application, enable it in the application's configuration file, Web.config, which resides in the root directory of the application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[HttpCookies 元素（ASP.NET Settings Schema）](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228262(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [httpCookies Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ms228262(v=vs.100)). 使用在 web.config 文件中设置的 属性覆盖值以编程方式设置的值。Values set programmatically using the property override values set in the Web.config file. 处理敏感信息时，强烈建议你将 HTTPS 协议与 SSL 加密配合使用。When dealing with sensitive information, it is strongly recommended that you use HTTPS protocol with SSL encryption. SSL 可防止更改数据（数据完整性）、保护用户的标识（机密性），并确保数据来自预期客户端（身份验证）。SSL protects against data being altered (data integrity), protects a user's identity (confidentiality), and assures that data originates from the expected client (authentication). 有关加密的优势的详细信息，请参阅[加密服务](/dotnet/standard/security/cryptographic-services)。For more information on the benefits of encryption, see [Cryptographic Services](/dotnet/standard/security/cryptographic-services). 有关在 Internet Information Services （IIS） Web 服务器上配置 SSL 的详细信息，请参阅[在 Web 服务器或网站上配置 ssl](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=38553)。For more information about configuring SSL on an Internet Information Services (IIS) Web server, see [Configuring SSL on a Web Server or a Web Site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=38553). ## Examples 如果 cookie 设置为使用 SSL 传输，则下面的代码示例将采取措施。The following code example takes action if the cookie is set to transmit using SSL. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Secure Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Using Secure Sockets Layer

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Shareable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Shareable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 确定 cookie 是否允许参与输出缓存。

span.span: Determines whether the cookie is allowed to participate in output caching.

value.span: 指定的 输出缓存不会给出包含一个或多个对外 cookie 的 取消；否则 。

span.span: to specify that output caching will not be suppressed for a give containing one or more outbound cookies; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果给定的 包含一个或多个 设置为 `false` 的出站 cookie （默认值），则将抑制响应的输出缓存。If a given contains one or more outbound cookies with is set to `false` (the default value), output caching will be suppressed for the response. 这会阻止包含潜在敏感信息的 cookie 缓存在响应中并发送到多个客户端。This prevents cookies that contain potentially sensitive information from being cached in the response and sent to multiple clients. 若要允许缓存包含 cookie 的响应，请为响应正常配置缓存，如使用 `OutputCache` 指令或 MVC 的 [OutputCache] 属性，并将所有出站 cookie 设置为具有 设置为 `true`。To allow a response containing cookies to be cached, configure caching normally for the response, such as using the `OutputCache` directive or MVC's [OutputCache] attribute, and set all outbound cookies to have set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的 cookie，并向其添加多个值。The following code example creates a new cookie and adds several values to it. 有关如何从一个 cookie 提取多个值的示例，请参阅 。For an example of how to extract multiple values from one cookie, see . [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookie.Values Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Values Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookie.Values Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookie.Values Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
